attributes.action: stop a registered sex offender from moving back to tremorfa.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: my son was a victim of a sexual assault by three girls he was abducted and subjected to degrading sex acts he was then beaten with sticks and had one pushed down his throat ... my family have been subjected to assaults and abuse from the family of the sex offender,my family still live in the tremorfa area and are very scared of hearing upon her release she will be moving back to her home address.since this assault took place me and my children have had to move out of tremorfa for our safety.. please can you look at this petition and take into consideration this is the victims wish not mine !! he is only 11 ..9 at the time .thank you for taking your time to read this .

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Welsh Assembly.
reasons: The names of individuals, or information where they may be identified, in relation to criminal accusations
